sentences.sContent: Its argument is tightly constructed, and its forthright, lucid style exemplifies levelheaded and penetrating criticism.
sentences.sContent_eng: Its argument is tightly constructed, and its forthright, lucid style exemplifies levelheaded and penetrating criticism.
sentences.sCn: 这本书的主题结构紧密， 直率、 明晰的风格例示了一种冷静而敏锐的文学评论。

synos.tran: 稳健的，头脑冷静的；明智的

remMethod.val: level(平坦的) + head(头脑) + ed → 大脑平坦的 → 头脑冷静的

trans.tranCn: 头脑冷静的， 清醒的
